personal.name: Raj Mathur
personal.title: Backend Developer | Full-Stack Enthusiast
personal.subtitle: Engineer building scalable backend systems and dynamic user interfaces

about.description: I'm a dedicated full-stack developer and Computer Science undergrad passionate about building performant backend systems and intuitive UIs. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, React, and Node.js with a strong grasp of DSA and system design. Currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science from IIIT Bhubaneswar with a CGPA of 7.83/10.
highlights: LeetCode Knight with rating 1948 and 900+ problems solved
Winner of The Innovation and GeoHack hackathons
Built scalable systems using Spring Boot and React
Deep knowledge in DSA, system design, and backend infrastructure
Currently working as Software Developer Intern at Smart Orbit Pvt Ltd

projects.title: Online Food Delivery App Backend
projects.description: Designed and implemented the backend of an online food delivery application, integrating secure user authentication and optimized database operations. Implemented JWT-based user authentication and role-based access control for enhanced security.

projects.title: Social Media App Backend
projects.description: Enhanced real-time messaging using WebSockets, improving communication speed by 40% and user engagement by 25%. Optimized database performance using Spring Data JPA and Hibernate. Improved user profile management by reducing latency by 35%.

projects.title: Expense Tracker App
projects.description: An interactive financial dashboard built with Angular and Spring Boot to visualize expenses and income trends using Chart.js. Features comprehensive analytics and budget management capabilities.

projects.title: Job Portal Website
projects.description: Full-stack job portal platform with user authentication, job posting, application management, and advanced search functionality. Built with modern technologies for optimal performance.

projects.title: Chat Room Application
projects.description: Real-time chat application with user authentication, message history, and WebSocket integration for instant messaging. Features multiple chat rooms and user presence indicators.

experience.description: Contributed to the development of the Acquire module and NearSearch project, working across both backend and frontend to build robust, location-based features and ensure seamless client-server integration.
achievements: Developed RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js, reducing API response time by 40%
Implemented location-based search functionality using geospatial filtering, resulting in 25% faster search results
Built responsive and interactive frontend components using React for NearSearch
Streamlined development workflow by creating comprehensive API documentation, reducing onboarding time by 50%
Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure smooth data flow and user experience

achievements.title: Winner - The Innovation Hackathon
achievements.description: Secured 1st place for building a scalable AI-based recommendation system and ML analytics-based environmental monitoring solution for farmers.

achievements.title: Winner - GeoHack 2024
achievements.description: Created a real-time location service using geospatial analytics, demonstrating expertise in location-based technologies.

achievements.title: Top 4 - Hackfest
achievements.description: Ranked among top 4 teams for building an integrated solution for farmers using Machine Learning and Blockchain technologies.

achievements.title: Finalist - Hacktoberfest 2024
achievements.description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, successfully completing all PR challenges and making impactful contributions.

achievements.title: Knight @LeetCode
achievements.description: Achieved Knight status with a rating of 1948, solved 900+ problems, and ranked in the top 3% of competitive programmers.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a project in mind or just want to chat about technology, feel free to reach out!
